boardgame.description: In Cockroach Salad players create a common salad packed with lettuce, peppers, tomatoes and cauliflower _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but they won't always be saying which ingredient they're adding to the bowl!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 128 cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 120 vegetable cards in the four types and eight _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;taboo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; vegetable cards, two of each type that bear cockroaches _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; are shuffled and divided among the players. On a turn, a player plays the top card from his deck onto the central pile of cards, naming the vegetable as he plays it, e.g., _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Pepper!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; except in the following situations:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; If his vegetable matches the previously played vegetable, the player must lie._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; If his vegetable matches the claim made by the previous player (perhaps because that player lied), then the player must lie._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; If he plays a taboo card, he shouts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Cockroach!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and the next player starts a new pile next to the first one so that the taboo card remains visible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; If his vegetable matches a visible taboo card, he must lie._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Make a mistake or stumble or hesitate too long, and a player must pick up all cards played to that point in the game. The first player to run out of cards wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can be combined with Kakerlakensuppe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Drei Magier Spiele - Kakkerlakkensalade Language: Dutch Players: 2 to 6 Age: 6+ Duration: 10 to 20 min Weight: 0.210 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: The players try to create a colorful salad as quickly as possibly by taking turns to put down their vegetable cards. Then as fast as the cards are being played, the players must _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;correctly_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; name the vegetable. But watch out, only the player who can quickly and correctly juggle between the truth and (emergency) lies will win!! Truly Tongue Twisting! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
